```{r, eval=F}

state.abb.us <- paste0('US-', state.abb)

state.trends <- pblapply(state.abb.us, function(x)  gtrends(c("flu",'pneumonia','fever','rsv', 'bronchiolitis'), geo = c(x), category = 0, gprop='web')
       )
saveRDS(state.trends, 'all.state.data.rds')
```
